function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High percentage of respondents lack a green view from the window, increasing the risk of limited access to natural environments.","Impact":"Decreased mental and physical well-being, lower quality of life, and reduced resilience to stress.","Mitigation":"Increase access to nearby green spaces, improve urban planning to incorporate more green areas, and promote the importance of nature in the built environment.","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, urban planning software, and digital mapping tools for green space identification.","People":"Residents living in areas with limited green spaces and views, especially in Lithuania, Italy, and Spain.","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Clear majority of respondents reported missing urban green spaces (UGS) during the period of closure, indicating a high demand for access to nature.","Impact":"Decreased well-being, increased stress, and limited opportunities for outdoor relaxation and recreation.","Mitigation":"Expand and enhance UGS, develop green corridors, and create more accessible public green spaces.","Technologies":"Green infrastructure development, urban green space mapping, and community engagement platforms for UGS planning.","People":"Residents living in urban areas, particularly in Italy, Spain, and Israel, who express a strong desire for access to UGS.","Owner":"Local governments, park authorities, and community advocacy groups."}]}
